Description: $200 Billion US Army Future Combat System Program Terminated

Description: VA's $1.9 billion Health Information Systems and Technology Architecture-Foundations Modernization Project Terminated
Nonmonetary: Unknown how much was lost/spent before cancellation, however, the VA planned to spend $385 million 2010 - 2014 on the project, or about $95 million per year. Given the program started in 2006, we could estimate that about $300 Million was spent on the program by the time it was canceled.

Description: SBINet Contract Terminated after $1 Billion Spent

Nonmonetary: DoD started program in 2007 and invested $6 Billion - decided not to spend another $15 Billion for software defined radios that didn't work
